A tool used to compare the air pollution data of two cities.

***

## Shiny App

Live version: [https://jjeong6.shinyapps.io/OpenAQProject/](https://jjeong6.shinyapps.io/OpenAQProject/)

## Functions of the tool

- Compares using autocomplete and allows the users to select at most two cities.
- Select the parameter of all the different units for air pollution readings in the API
- Select the data range to display graph
